alert.note: Alert for Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:42PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Schleicher and southeastern Tom Green Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 642 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Christoval, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Christoval. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
